message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.GR, cs.MM

This paper is primarily focused on computer vision tasks such as segmentation and recognition, which suggests that it is likely to belong to the cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) sub-category. The paper proposes a novel algorithm for boundary detection that is applicable to different types of boundaries, which could fall under the cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) sub-category. The paper also mentions the use of soft-segmentation, which could be relevant to the cs.LG (Machine Learning) sub-category. The evaluation of the algorithm on different types of boundaries obtained using motion cues and RGB-D cameras suggests that the paper could also belong to the cs.GR (Graphics) sub-category. Finally, the mention of a novel method for figure/ground soft-segmentation suggests that the paper could be relevant to the cs.MM (Multimedia) sub-category.
